title: Birth Scenario
description: You're born into a loving and caring family of substantial means. Your parents offer you:

options.text: A lavish upbringing with the best education and comforts.
A balanced upbringing with an emphasis on morals and values.
Neglectful parenting but freedom to explore and learn independently.

title: Early Education
description: It's time to choose your educational path:

options.text: Attend an elite private school known for creating extremely successful individuals.
Enroll in a public school with diverse peers and experiences.
Pursue homeschooling to tailor your education to your interests.

title: Career Decision
description: You're starting your career journey. Which path do you choose?

options.text: Accept a high-paying, but stressful job at a prestigious company.
Follow your passion into a lower-paying but fulfilling career.
Pursue entrepreneurship for flexibility but uncertain income.

title: Retirement Planning
description: Early in your career, you start thinking about retirement and the power of compound interest. Which do you choose?

options.text: Save diligently and max out your 401(k) for a comfortable retirement.
Focus on experiences and relationships, accepting a modest retirement lifestyle.
Neglect retirement planning and hope for the best. You like working anyhow.

title: Relationship Crossroads
description: You meet someone special. How do you approach the relationship?

options.text: Settle down with a financially stable partner for security.
Follow your heart despite financial differences.
Focus on your own career, avoiding commitment.

title: Financial Investment
description: You come into some money from an inheritance. What do you do with it?

options.text: Invest in stocks and real estate for long-term financial growth.
Splurge on luxury items and experiences for immediate gratification.
Donate most of it to charity and invest in your community.

title: Health and Wellness
description: As you're getting older, it's time to prioritize your health:

options.text: Invest in a comprehensive health insurance plan and regular check-ups.
Embrace a healthy lifestyle with regular exercise and nutritious diet.
Continue to neglect health concerns and prioritize other aspects of life.
Have 2 children, providing them with a stable and nurturing environment.
Have 10 children, which you love, but can't support properly.
Choose not to have children and focus on career advancement.

title: Mid-career Crisis
description: Your career hits a roadblock and you are not enjoying your job. How do you respond?

options.text: Seek career advancement opportunities or further education.
Embrace a career change or pursue a passion project with risk.
Accept the situation and try to push through without doing much.

title: Financial Setback
description: Your house burns down, and you did not have homeowners insurance. This is a major financial setback. What are you going to do?

options.text: Tighten your budget and seek additional sources of income.
Draw on the retirement funds you have (if any), putting your future in jeopardy.
Take out risky loans to overcome the setback, potentially increasing debt.

title: Family Matters
description: Your aging parents need constant care. What do you do?

options.text: Move them into your home and provide care yourself.
Hire professional caregivers to assist.
Place them in a high-quality assisted living facility.

title: Social Commitments
description: You're invited to multiple social events on the same evening. How do you respond?

options.text: Attend the charity gala and network with influential people.
Spend quality time with close friends at a low-key gathering.
Skip both and have a quiet night at home.

title: Relationship Decision
description: You're torn between staying in a comfortable but stagnant relationship or pursuing something new

options.text: Commit to working on your current relationship.
End the relationship and explore new possibilities.
Stay in the current relationship without addressing issues.

title: Investment Dilemma
description: You have some extra money to invest

options.text: Invest in a high-risk, high-reward venture.
Invest in a stable but lower-returning opportunity.
Spend the money on something enjoyable but non-investment.

title: Career Crossroads
description: You're offered a promotion at work, but it requires relocating to another city

options.text: Accept the promotion.
Decline the promotion, but negotiate a raise.
Decline the promotion and stay in your current position.

title: Health Crisis
description: You're diagnosed with a chronic illness. How do you respond?

options.text: Invest heavily in top-tier medical treatment.
Opt for a more moderate treatment plan.
Ignore medical advice and hope for the best.

title: Elderly care
description: As you age, you need assistance with daily activities

options.text: Move into a high-end retirement community with comprehensive care.
Hire a live-in caregiver for personalized attention.
Rely solely on family members for support.

title: Legacy choices
description: You're making decisions about your will and estate planning. What do you do?

options.text: Leave a significant portion of your wealth to charitable causes.
Prioritize leaving a financial legacy for your descendants.
Spend your wealth on fulfilling lifelong dreams and experiences.

title: End-of-Life Care
description: You're facing terminal illness and must decide on your end-of-life care

options.text: Pursue aggressive medical treatment to prolong your life.
Choose palliative care for comfort and quality of life.
Reject medical intervention and focus on quality time with loved ones.
